message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. I think this is a great price considering the product's value to you is $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to get a better deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you is $8000
